name: Plane Game
description:
Plane Game

Made by voidedground
**********
Controls:
Left Arrow:  Move Left
Right Arrow:  Move Right
F3:  Developer Mode
Space: Fire
**********
How to play:
Shoot the birds to get points
Don't let the birds pass, or you will lose 5 points
Don't hit the birds, or you will lose 5 points and a health point
If you lose all of your health points, the game is over
The birds will get faster and more frequent as the game goes on
**********
Double click ka1.tff to install the font before playing
Double click the .exe to play
Two windows will open, ignore the console
Have fun

***********

This is the first game I have ever made or released, feedback would be much appreciated!
